name: Jacob
aiEnhancedDetails:
Based on the provided image and information, here is a detailed, objective physical description of the individual:

The individual is a male with a light complexion. He has short, dark brown hair, mostly covered by a dark blue baseball cap that features a light-colored logo/text on the front. He wears black-framed, rectangular glasses. His eyebrows are dark and of medium thickness. His nose is of medium size with a straight bridge. He has full lips and visible upper teeth in a smile. No facial hair is apparent.

His build appears to be average. He is depicted standing upright.

For identification in the context of the image, he is wearing a red short-sleeved polo shirt with three buttons at the collar (two of which are unbuttoned). A name tag reading "State Farm" and "Jake" is clipped to his right chest area. He is also wearing khaki-colored long pants and purple disposable gloves on both hands.
